DOC.criteria: Adult ( > 18 year ) Pregnant woman first trimester ( < 14 week ) Single gestation pregnancy Nonsmoker Multiplegestation pregnancy Current smoker Currently operate air filter home Currently live ger ( traditional Mongolian feltlined yurt ) Plan give birth outside hospital clinic Ulaanbaatar
